Title: Publishing Product-Linked Notes on Xiaohongshu
Content: To publish a product-linked note on Xiaohongshu, follow these steps: First, open the Xiaohongshu app and click on the '+' icon to create a new post. Upload your prepared images and write a compelling title and content for your note. Don't forget to add relevant hashtags by using the '#' symbol. Next, click on 'Add Product' to link the product from your store. Select the product you want to associate with the note, and it will appear as 'Buy the same product' in the post. You can also add a comment that will be pinned in the comment section, encouraging users to purchase the product. Finally, click 'Publish' to share your note. This method ensures that your note is linked to your store's products, making it easier for users to make a purchase.

Title: Using Hot Topics to Enhance Note Visibility
Content: Enhancing the visibility of your notes on Xiaohongshu can be achieved by leveraging hot topics. To do this, go to the 'Creation Center' in the app and select 'Note Inspiration.' Find a hot topic related to your product category, such as 'Food' or 'Fashion.' For example, if you are selling food items, you might choose a topic like 'Travel Food' or 'Sweet Treats.' By associating your note with a popular topic, it will automatically include the topic's hashtag, increasing its visibility. You can add up to five additional hashtags to further boost your note's reach. Follow the same steps as before to add your product link and publish the note. This strategy helps your note gain more exposure by tapping into trending discussions.

Title: Publishing Notes via Xiaohongshu Merchant Backend
Content: Another effective way to publish product-linked notes on Xiaohongshu is through the merchant backend, known as 'Qianfan.' Log in to the Qianfan backend and navigate to the 'Community Hot Search Terms' section. Here, you can find trending keywords related to your product, such as 'Wedding Candy' or 'Spicy Cabbage.' Look for keywords marked with 'Rising Popularity' or 'High Demand for Notes,' as these indicate opportunities for additional traffic support. Click on the keyword and select 'Publish Now.' Follow the same steps to add your product link and complete the note. Publishing through the merchant backend can provide extra traffic support from Xiaohongshu, increasing the chances of your note being seen by a larger audience.
